metadata.title: CVE-2021-43415 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise up to 1.0.13, 1.1.7, and 1.2.0, with the QEMU task driver enabled, allowed authenticated users with job submission capabilities to bypass the configured allowed image paths. Fixed in 1.0.14, 1.1.8, and 1.2.1.

criterions.comment: nomad package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
